channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Car damaged - Hit and Run by Ford Black pick up truck, 20th February
item.description:
Hi, Owner of the Ford Black pick up truck, please come forward so we can come to a resolution. Incidence: Time/Date: Tuesday 17th @4.51pm We have evidence already Resident of Sandpit Place

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Sandpit Place, Charlton
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole on speed bump., 20th February
item.description:
This pothole has been here for some time and is getting worse every day
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Tizzard Grove, Kidbrooke

item.title: There are a series of potholes, situated between Derwent Crescent and Green Road, N20, 20th February
item.description:
These potholes have been there for several months. in my opinion, the whole stretch needs resurfacing. you resurfaced the whole area south of this last year, but missed this stretch out, since then it has gotten much worse.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Britannia Road, Finchley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The walkway lights are not working on the ground, 1st and 2nd floors to the right of the main entrance., 20th February
item.description:
Walkway lighting is not working in the Tattersall Close block on the ground, 1st and 2nd floors to the right of the main entra ce. This is causing a potential slip, trip or fall hazard due to the lack of light. It also makes it difficult to unlock the front door as you cannot see the lock easily in the dark.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Tattersall Close, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet
